quoteList.q: The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.
quoteList.h:
“The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.” —
Benjamin Mays

quoteList.q: If there were no God, there would be no atheists.
quoteList.h:
“If there were no God, there would be no atheists.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

quoteList.q: Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible in us be found.
quoteList.h:
“Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible in us be found.” —
Pema Chodron

quoteList.q: Curiosity is the most powerful thing you own.
quoteList.h:
“Curiosity is the most powerful thing you own.” —
James Cameron

quoteList.q: The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.
quoteList.h:
“The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.” —
Jack Kerouac

quoteList.q: A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quoteList.h:
“A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.” —
Colin Powell

quoteList.q: The greatest weariness comes from work not done.
quoteList.h:
“The greatest weariness comes from work not done.” —
Eric Hoffer

quoteList.q: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.
quoteList.h:
“Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.” —
Sigmund Freud

quoteList.q: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
quoteList.h:
“You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.” —
Steve Maraboli

quoteList.q: The only way round is through.
quoteList.h:
“The only way round is through.” —
Robert Frost

quoteList.q: Throw me to the wolves and I will return leading the pack.
quoteList.h:
“Throw me to the wolves and I will return leading the pack. ” —
Seneca

quoteList.q: Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
quoteList.h:
“Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.” —
Criss Jami

quoteList.q: Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.
quoteList.h:
“Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.” —
Ayn Rand

quoteList.q: The highest level of wisdom is when you not only accept but love adversity.
quoteList.h:
“The highest level of wisdom is when you not only accept but love adversity.” —
Maxime Lagace

quoteList.q: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
quoteList.h:
“Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.” —
Colin Powell

quoteList.q: It's your life-but only if you make it so.
quoteList.h:
“It's your life-but only if you make it so.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteList.q: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
quoteList.h:
“The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention. ” —
Kahlil Gibran

quoteList.q: To earn more you must learn more.
quoteList.h:
“To earn more you must learn more.” —
Brian Tracy

quoteList.q: Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.
quoteList.h:
“Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.” —
Charles Dickens

quoteList.q: Failure is the highway to success.
quoteList.h:
“Failure is the highway to success.” —
Og Mandino

quoteList.q: Peace if possible, truth at all costs.
quoteList.h:
“Peace if possible, truth at all costs.” —
Martin Luther

quoteList.q: Life is like underwear, should be changed twice a day.
quoteList.h:
“Life is like underwear, should be changed twice a day. ” —
Ray Bradbury

quoteList.q: Work joyfully and peacefully, knowing that right thoughts and right efforts inevitably bring about right results.
quoteList.h:
“Work joyfully and peacefully, knowing that right thoughts and right efforts inevitably bring about right results.” —
James Allen

quoteList.q: Show kindness but never expect it. Show authenticity but never expect it. Only the wise are indifferent to things they can't control.
quoteList.h:
“Show kindness but never expect it. Show authenticity but never expect it. Only the wise are indifferent to things they can't control.” —
Maxime Lagace

quoteList.q: In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
quoteList.h:
“In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us. ” —
Beverly Sills

quoteList.q: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
quoteList.h:
“If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration. ” —
Nikola Tesla

quoteList.q: The man who does not value himself, cannot value anything or anyone.
quoteList.h:
“The man who does not value himself, cannot value anything or anyone.” —
Ayn Rand

quoteList.q: But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.
quoteList.h:
“But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.” —
D. H. Lawrence

quoteList.q: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.
quoteList.h:
“Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.” —
Elon Musk

quoteList.q: You have the ability, now apply yourself.
quoteList.h:
“You have the ability, now apply yourself.” —
Benjamin Mays

quoteList.q: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
quoteList.h:
“You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteList.q: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
quoteList.h:
“Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

quoteList.q: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
quoteList.h:
“Opportunities multiply as they are seized.” —
Sun Tzu

quoteList.q: We turn not older with years but newer every day.
quoteList.h:
“We turn not older with years but newer every day.” —
Emily Dickinson

quoteList.q: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quoteList.h:
“If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quoteList.q: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
quoteList.h:
“The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.” —
Mark Twain

quoteList.q: We can spend our whole lives escaping from the monsters of our minds.
quoteList.h:
“We can spend our whole lives escaping from the monsters of our minds.” —
Pema Chodron

quoteList.q: Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.
quoteList.h:
“Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.” —
Robert Greene

quoteList.q: True love stories never have endings.
quoteList.h:
“True love stories never have endings.” —
Richard Bach

quoteList.q: Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you're really a yawn if it goes.
quoteList.h:
“Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you're really a yawn if it goes.” —
Bette Midler

quoteList.q: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quoteList.h:
“You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.” —
Kahlil Gibran

quoteList.q: We have to walk in a way that we only print peace and serenity on the Earth. Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
quoteList.h:
“We have to walk in a way that we only print peace and serenity on the Earth. Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.” —
Thich Nhat Hanh

quoteList.q: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
quoteList.h:
“Never was anything great achieved without danger.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

quoteList.q: The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quoteList.h:
“The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.” —
Chinese Proverb

quoteList.q: The more reasons you have for achieving your goal, the more determined you will become.
quoteList.h:
“The more reasons you have for achieving your goal, the more determined you will become.” —
Brian Tracy

quoteList.q: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.
quoteList.h:
“You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.” —
Rumi

quoteList.q: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
quoteList.h:
“Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.” —
Alexander Graham Bell

quoteList.q: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
quoteList.h:
“The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.” —
James Allen

quoteList.q: Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.
quoteList.h:
“Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteList.q: Happiness is only real, when shared.
quoteList.h:
“Happiness is only real, when shared.” —
Christopher McCandless
